name: .CSWORLD
summary: Learn about .CSWORLD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: If you are using version 1.3 or above of Terraria for Android, place your CSWORLD file in the following directory:
The next time you open Terraria, the game will convert your CSWORLD file to a WLD file, and allow you to select the world your CSWORLD file contains.

If you are using version 1.2 or below of Terraria for Android, you can open your CSWORLD file by placing it in your Google Drive, connecting your Google Drive account to Terraria, and then selecting your CSWORLD file from Terraria's Select World screen.
